jathika tharuna sewa sabhawa, shri lanka yauwana samaja sammelanaya saha yauwana katayuthu saha nipunatha sanwardhana amathyanshaya ekwa sanwidhana karana 25wani shri lanka yuth jathika krida ulele kantha/pirimi awidima, papadi ha marathan tharaga ada (13) saha heta (14) polonnaruwedi pawathwe.kantha/pirimi awidima tharaga ada pe.wa 6.00ta aarambhawana athara pirimi tharaga ki.mi.10kin saha kantha tharagaya ki.mi.5ka durakin yukthawe.polonnaruwa pradeshiya sabhawa asalin pe.wa 8.00ta aarambha wana kilomitar 106.6ka durakin yuth pirimi papadi tharagaya kanduruwela nagaraya, polisiya, karmika widyalaya, patu palama, manampitiya palama , kotaliya patu palama, manampitiya nagaraya, madakalapuwa handiya, walikanda namapuwaruwa, dumriya haras maga, sewanapitiya, monarathanna handiya, walikanda handiya, sinhapura handiya, aselapura handiya, kadawathamaduwa handiya, walachchena namapuwaruwa asalin wakaneri handiya polis murapola asalata gos nawatha hari ema margaya osse gaman kara aarambhaka sthanayenma awasan we.kantha papadi tharaga ki.mi.35ka durak wana pe.wa 8.15ta aarambhawe.

ema samikshanaye prathipala luhundin awabodha kara ganima apa katath wadagathya.aanduwe karyala danatamath karya mandalaye kalayen 70% k waya karanne kadadasi piri sakasuma sandaha ya.ape lekhanayange 90% k thawamath kadadasiya.lekhanayan gen 7.5% ka athi thorathuru wiwidhakara hethu nisa pahadili natha, nathnam winasha wi atha.kadadasi lekhanayan gen 15% k ahambau lesa ho sitha matha ho asthana gatha weyi.lekhanayan gen 30% ka aththe yalpana giya thorathuruya.bhawitha karana kadadasi sankhyawa wasarakata 20% bagin wadi weyi.lekhanayaka piriwayen 75% k kalamanakaranaya saha karya sanwidhanaya sandaha weyi.karyala sewakayan siya kalayen 40% k gatha karanuye thorathuru sewimataya.wruththiyawediyek warshikawa paya 500 k lipi gonu samalochanaya karaminuth thawath paya 150 k waradi lesa gonu kala lekhana soyaminuth gatha karayi.1990 warshayata sapekshawa thorathuru daththa this gunayakin wadi wi athi athara eya pawathwa gena yamata dawantha wehesak darayi.sama wasara 2 1/2 kata warak mema thorathuru deguna weyi.ilektronik lekhana sandaha gabada kirima saha aaraksha kirima sandaha yanne itha sulu idakadak saha wiyadamaki.kadadasi rahithawa kriya kirimen mihithalaya parisarikawa surakimata maha pituwahalak labe.ilektronik lekhana bhawithaya thulin siyalu katayuthu thathpara gananakata sima wi karyakshamathawa kihipa gunayakin wadi we.dan apa ilektronika lekhana sandaha maruwimata sudusuma kalayayi.
